select.id: select特別地域加算減免By被保険者番号

mapper.select: SELECT DbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen.*, DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei.* FROM () AS DbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen LEFT JOIN () AS DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei ON DbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_shoKisaiHokenshaNo" and DbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_hihokenshaNo" = DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_hihokenshaNo" and DbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_rirekiNo" = DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_shinseiRirekiNo" WHERE DbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND (DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_gemmenGengakuShurui" = #{減免減額種類} OR DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_gemmenGengakuShurui" IS NULL) ORDER BY DbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_shinseiYMD" DESC

SELECT A.*, B.* FROM () AS A LEFT JOIN () AS B ON A."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = B."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AND A."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_hihokenshaNo" = B."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_hihokenshaNo" AND A."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_rirekiNo" = B."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_shinseiRirekiNo" AND B."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_gemmenGengakuShurui" = #{減免減額種類} WHERE A."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND A."dbT4020TokubetsuchiikiKasanGemmen_rirekiNo" = #{履歴番号}
